trans-unit.source: Used by services to send discovery announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av tjenester til å sende discovery kunngjøring meldinger.

trans-unit.source: Clients can use the discovery mechanism, specifically the corresponding <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService"></xref> class to listen and act on the announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: Klienter kan bruke discovery-mekanisme, spesielt den tilsvarende <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService"> </xref> klassen for å lytte og fungerer på kunngjøringen meldinger.

trans-unit.source: An announcement message contains information about the service such as its fully-qualified contract name, any scopes that the service is operating in as well as any custom metadata the service wants to send.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen kunngjøring inneholder informasjon om tjenesten som den fullstendige Kontraktnavn, omfang som tjenesten kjører i og eventuelle egendefinerte metadata tjenesten vil sende.

trans-unit.source: If a service adds the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryBehavior> behavior and specifies an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> the service automatically sends announcement messages when the service goes online or comes offline.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du legger til en tjeneste den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryBehavior>virkemåte, og angir en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint>tjenesten sender automatisk kunngjøring meldinger når tjenesten går online eller kommer frakoblet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Use this class when you want to explicitly send the announcement messages yourself.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen når du vil sende eksplisitt kunngjøringen meldinger selv.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Kunngjøring-endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref> class with the specified endpoint configuration.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref> klassen med den angitte endepunktkonfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint configuration to use.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på endepunktkonfigurasjon skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Causes an offline announcement message (Bye) to be sent with the specified endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen frakoblet kunngjøring (Bye) som skal sendes med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: Causes an offline announcement message (Bye) to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen frakoblet kunngjøring (Bye) sendes asynkront med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: Causes an offline announcement message (Bye) to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata and user-defined state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør en frakoblet kunngjøring melding (Bye) som skal sendes asynkront med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene og brukerdefinerte tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte tilstand-data.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous offline announcement (Bye) completes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en asynkron frakoblet kunngjøring (Bye) er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when an offline announcement is sent synchronously by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOffline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når en frakoblet kunngjøring sendes synkront ved å kalle <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOffline%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOffline%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Causes an offline task announcement message (Bye) to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Gjør frakoblet oppgaven kunngjøring meldingen (Bye) sendes asynkront med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: An offline task announcement message to be sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen frakoblet oppgaven kunngjøring sendes asynkront.

trans-unit.source: Causes an online announcement message (Hello) to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen online kunngjøring (Hallo) som skal sendes.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: Causes an online announcement (Hello) message to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen online kunngjøring (Hallo) sendes asynkront med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: Causes an online announcement (Hello) message to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata and user-defined state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen online kunngjøring (Hallo) sendes asynkront med den angitte endepunktet discovery metadata og brukerdefinerte tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte tilstand-data.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous online announcement (Hello) completes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en asynkron online kunngjøring (Hallo) er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when an online announcement is sent synchronously by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOnline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når en online kunngjøring sendes synkront ved å kalle <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOnline%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient.AnnounceOnline%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Causes an online task announcement message (Hello) to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Gjør online oppgaven kunngjøring meldingen (Hallo) sendes asynkront med de angitte endepunkt discovery metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: An online task announcement message to be sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen online oppgaven kunngjøring sendes asynkront.

trans-unit.source: Causes an offline announcement (Bye) message to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata and user-defined state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen frakoblet kunngjøring (Bye) sendes asynkront med den angitte endepunktet discovery metadata og brukerdefinerte tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.AsyncCallback> is called when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref:System.AsyncCallback>kalles når operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte tilstand-data.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>forekomsten.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Causes an online announcement (Hello) message to be sent asynchronously with the specified endpoint discovery metadata and user-defined state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør meldingen online kunngjøring (Hallo) sendes asynkront med den angitte endepunktet discovery metadata og brukerdefinerte tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.AsyncCallback> is called when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref:System.AsyncCallback>kalles når operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet discovery metadata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte tilstand-data.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>forekomsten.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets the channel factory associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kanalfabrikken knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: Gets the client credentials associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter klienten legitimasjon knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Waits for a pending asynchronous offline announcement to complete.
trans-unit.target: Venter på en ventende asynkron frakoblet kunngjøring skal fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til ventende asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Waits for a pending asynchronous online announcement to complete.
trans-unit.target: Venter på en ventende asynkron online kunngjøring skal fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til ventende asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Gets the inner channel associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den indre kanalen som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel>forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message sequence generator associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir meldingen sekvens generatoren knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Åpner den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Utfører Programdefinert oppgaver som er forbundet med frigjøring, frigi eller tilbakestille uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Får en Kommunikasjonsobjektet overgang umiddelbart fra den gjeldende tilstanden til tilstanden lukket.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å lukke en kommunikasjon-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone Lukkeoperasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object with a specified timeout.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å lukke en kommunikasjon objekt med en angitt tidsavbrudd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir hvor lenge sendeoperasjonen må fullføres før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone Lukkeoperasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å åpne et objekt for kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone åpne operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone åpne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone åpne operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å åpne et objekt for kommunikasjon i et angitt tidsintervall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir hvor lenge sendeoperasjonen må fullføres før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone åpne operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone åpne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone åpne operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør et objekt for kommunikasjon overgang fra den gjeldende tilstanden til tilstanden lukket.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Gjør et objekt for kommunikasjon overgang fra den gjeldende tilstanden til tilstanden lukket i et angitt tidsintervall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir hvor lenge sendeoperasjonen må fullføres før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å lukke en kommunikasjon-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å åpne et objekt for kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: Gjør et objekt for kommunikasjon overgang fra den opprettede tilstanden til tilstanden åpnet.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Gjør et objekt for kommunikasjon overgang fra den opprettede tilstanden til tilstanden åpnet i et angitt tidsintervall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir hvor lenge sendeoperasjonen må fullføres før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the communication-oriented object.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for kommunikasjon orientert-objektet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> of the object.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>for objektet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>
